pipeline.aerie.name: Aerie Shaders
config.aerie.desc.taa: Uses data across different frames to smartly remove most aliasing from the image.
config.aerie.desc.fog_start_multiplier: Affects how far from the player the fog starts.
config.aerie.desc.brighter_sun_and_moon:
Increases the brightness of the sun and moon. 
Will not work for resource packs that change the sun and moon shape.
config.aerie.desc.alpha_foliage: Adjusts the foliage tint color to look more like Minecraft Alpha.
config.aerie.desc.emission: The brightness of emissive objects. Increases the brightness of bloom.
config.aerie.desc.handheld_light: Handheld light handled by the shader. Only works for the player.
config.aerie.desc.colored_handheld_light: Enables custom colored handheld light as defined by the FREX Held Light API.
config.aerie.desc.blocky_handheld_light: Enable this to make handheld light look less out of place when smooth lighting is disabled.
config.aerie.desc.diffuse_light: Darkens different faces depending on their direction. Makes the lighting less flat.
config.aerie.desc.true_cave_darkness: Removes the subtle ambient lighting present in caves.
config.aerie.desc.true_night_darkness:
Darkens the bright ambient light during night. 
Depends on moon phase.
config.aerie.desc.custom_clouds: Uses voxel ray tracing to draw custom clouds. Can be really slow on some machines.
config.aerie.desc.cloud_layers: How many cloud layers to draw.
config.aerie.desc.diffuse_skylight: Uses the sun/moon vector for diffuse lighting instead of a hardcoded direction like in vanilla.
config.aerie.desc.autogenerated_normals:
Autogenerates normals based on pixel luminance, with configurable resolution. 
Mild performance impact.
config.aerie.desc.normals_strength: The strength of the autogenerated normals. When increased, makes normal-based lighting look higher contrast and sharper.
config.aerie.desc.normals_resolution: No performance impact. Change this to fit the resolution of your resource pack.
config.aerie.desc.enable_bloom: Allows bright colors to bleed onto other colors. Mild performance impact.
config.aerie.desc.bloom_amount:
The amount of bloom that the entire screen has. 
To control the brightness of light sources, change emission strength.
